text: mage paramadhipatiyaneni, oba mata rajyaya pirinæmuvehiya. tavada siduvim vala yatharthaya igænvuvehiya. ahas ha polove nirmapakayaneni, melova ha matu lovehi mage bharakaru obaya. ma (obata) avanata vanneku lesin maranayata pat karanu mænava tavada dæhæmiyan samaga ma ek karanu mænava ( yanuven ohu prarthana kaleya)
